globalfindbar.author: Noitidart
globalfindbar.description: Fore Firefox 25+ reverts the findbar to global behavior.
globalfindbar.name: globalfindbar

preferences.description: Applies the pre-FF25 looks to the find bar
preferences.name: restore_old_style
preferences.title: Restore Old Style

preferences.description: Findbar state is matched in tabs that meet this criteria
preferences.name: tabScope
preferences.title: Tab Scope

preferences.description: Findbar state is matched in windows that meet this criteria
preferences.name: winScope
preferences.title: Window Scope

preferences.description: Criteria defining if opened findbar should be focused when tab is selected
preferences.name: findbarFocus
preferences.title: Findbar Autofocus
